thread.title: Excellent hotel in line with Firmdale hotels standards
thread.title_full: Excellent hotel in line with Firmdale hotels standards - Review of Number Sixteen, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: AdventurerHamburg
title: Excellent hotel in line with Firmdale hotels standards
text:
I was a bit scared at first to book a 12 sqm room in a hotel, since I usually struggle even with 18. However, I really wanted to try Number Sixteen, paying more or less affordable price.
I was pleasantly surprised that the ceilings are really high, and this makes the room very comfy and not claustrophobic at all. Besides I had access to the French balcony, which made it even better.
The French balconies however are not so isolated, so you might meet your neighbours, as it is more like one common space for the whole front facing floor.
The air-conditioning has a pleasant sound, and makes the outside noises diminish.
The room was very clean, and there was everything you would need. I'd say you could even put two people in this room, or at least try.
In general, there was nothing to complain about. I have stayed at the Soho Hotel before which has upgraded me to a really huge room for the same price that I payed at Number 16. This didn't happen at Number Sixteen, however there was a nice welcome gift of a candle. And the stuff working at the hotel were pleasant and emotionally intelligent.
The hotel is still on the way to provide the same experience as The Soho Hotel, it's one small step below, but it is on a good way. Lets wish them luck.
Room Tip: A superior room is just right for one person. Front facing offers a nice view on a beautiful buildin... See more room tips
